name: Buttons, Adventure & Explosions
description:
Hello, and welcome to Buttnz'4'Fonez. It's your first day on the job but you arrive to an office entangled in scandal. Using your deductive skills, it is your mission to uncover the cause of it all and expose the culprit! Can you do it or will the person responsible get off Scott-free?

Find out, in Buttons, Adventure and EXPLOSIONS – an interesting take on the visual novel genre, made using the Unreal engine and a collection of original 2D and 3D assets!

Created by:

  • Tristan Whitfield ( Story / Music / Art )
  • Jeremy Craig ( Code / Art )
